turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've been trying to reach Grandpa Walter regarding an urgent matter. Can I confirm this is his residence number?

Yes, this is Walter's home. How can I help you with the IRS matters? But hold on a moment, could you please give me your ID number or something? Just so I know it's really the IRS calling. My wife should be here in a minute to confirm too.

Of course, Grandpa Walter. Here's my badge number: IRS-7734. Now regarding the unpaid taxes from last year, we've given you several chances to comply but unfortunately, there's now an arrest warrant out for your immediate cooperation. We need you to resolve this today within the hour or there will be law enforcement intervention at your door. Can I assist you with arranging payment right away?
Oh dear, that sounds serious. Let me just put this on hold a moment while I get my wife's opinion. Hold please, Agent Mitchell.

I understand, Grandpa Walter. Please take your time and consult with your wife. Once you're ready to proceed, we can work through this quickly using gift cards from major retailers as your payment method. Just have the total amount of $4850 available when you return to the call. We'll be standing by to guide you through the process for a swift resolution.
Alright, hold on just a bit more while I gather some information we might need. My wife and I will get back to you soon, okay? Thank you for understanding.

Absolutely, Grandpa Walter. We're here to help ensure this is resolved smoothly. Take your time and feel free to reach out whenever you're ready. Our priority is to assist you in avoiding any unnecessary legal complications.

Thank you, Agent Mitchell. I appreciate that. We'll call back soon after we've had a chance to review our finances. Until then, can you please not contact us again until we make the call? It's just so sudden and worrying for us.

Of course, Grandpa Walter. We will respect your timeline and await your next call. Please remember, once you are ready, using gift cards is the quickest method to resolve this matter and prevent any legal issues from escalating further. Take care and we look forward to speaking with you soon.
Thank you for your understanding. We'll be in touch as soon as we can sort things out. Goodbye for now.
